Step 1:
Insert into UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2
 Select TGT.COMMON_ID, SRC.UPC, SRC.Retailer_code, SRC.ITEM_ID, NOW() from
(SELECT
    FIELD_24 AS UPC,
    $Y AS RETAILER_CODE,
    FIELD_1 AS ITEM_ID
  FROM $X
  WHERE FIELD_24 <> 'UPC' AND FIELD_24 IS NOT NULL AND FIELD_24 <> ' ' AND FIELD_24 <> 0 AND FIELD_24 REGEXP '^[0-9]+$'
  GROUP BY UPC, RETAILER_CODE
) SRC
JOIN UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2 TGT
ON SRC.UPC = TGT.UPC
and TGT.RETAILER_CODE <> $Y and TGT.RETAILER_CODE is null
group by 1,2,3,4
Step 3:
Insert into UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP_W3 (
  UPC,
  RETAILER_CODE,
  ITEM_ID,
AUDITTIME)
 Select SRC.UPC, SRC.Retailer_code, SRC.ITEM_ID, NOW() from
(SELECT
    FIELD_24 AS UPC,
    $Y AS RETAILER_CODE,
    FIELD_1 AS ITEM_ID
  FROM $X
  WHERE FIELD_24 <> 'UPC' AND FIELD_24 IS NOT NULL AND FIELD_24 <> ' '  AND FIELD_24 <> 0 AND FIELD_24 REGEXP '^[0-9]+$'
 GROUP BY UPC, RETAILER_CODE
) SRC
LEFT JOIN UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2 TGT
ON SRC.UPC = TGT.UPC
where TGT.UPC is null
;
Step 5: create table $Z select  a.FIELD_1 as ITEM_ID,  a.FIELD_2 as TITLE,  a.FIELD_9 as DESCRIPTION,  '' as COLOR,  '' as SIZE,  a.FIELD_24 as UPC,  a.FIELD_6 as PRODUCT_URL,  a.FIELD_7 as IMAGE_URL,  a.FIELD_6 as AFFILIATE_URL,  b.common_id as PRICE_ID,  a.FIELD_13 + ' ' AS PRICE1,  a.FIELD_14 + ' ' AS PRICE2,  '' as SKU_CONDITION,   a.FIELD_20 as MPN,   a.FIELD_21 as MANUFACTURER,   a.FIELD_19 as KEYWORDS,   '' as CATEGORY_BREADCRUMB,   (    CASE     WHEN a.FIELD_25 NOT  REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' THEN ''     WHEN a.FIELD_25 = 60 THEN a.FIELD_34        WHEN a.FIELD_25 = 80 THEN a.FIELD_31        ELSE ''    END) AS GENDER,  a.FIELD_17 as BRAND ,  NOW() as TIMEAUDIT from $X a, UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2  b  where a.FIELD_24 = b.upc and b.retailer_code = $Y and a.FIELD_24 <> 'UPC' and a.FIELD_24 is not null AND FIELD_24 REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' and a.FIELD_24 <> ' ' AND FIELD_24 <> 0 and length(a.FIELD_24) < 51 ;
